name: Australian Tea Tree Industry Association
membership: Essential Oil Producers Association of Australia http://eopaa.com.au/
memberOrga: Tea Tree growers based in Australia and other non producer members with an interest in the TTO supply chain
goal:
The Australian Tea Tree Industry Association (ATTIA Ltd) is an Australian based not-for-profit organisation formed in 1986 as the peak body to promote and represent the interests of the Australian tea tree industry. From the grower/producers to the manufacturers of off-the-shelf products for public use, ATTIA supports and promotes the responsible use of pure Australian tea tree oil (TTO).
ATTIAâ€™s aim is to develop a stable, cohesive, environmentally friendly, and internationally competitive TTO industry producing quality assured pure Australian TTO that meets or exceeds international standards. ATTIA promotes the safe effective use of pure Australian TTO for a wide range of applications.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Public Health
